description: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a .NET Project management component that enables .NET applications to not only read and manipulate Microsoft Project documents in MPP and XML formats but to also write Microsoft Project documents in Project XML format - all without using Microsoft Project.
releaseNotes:
New Features
TASKS-12506 - Microsoft Project 2010 Support.
TASKS-12765 - MS Project 2010 MPP format read support.
TASKS-15911 - Read Tasks and Resources’ TimephasedData from MS Project 2003/2007/2010 MPP files.

Enhancements
TASKS-29180 – [New for MS Project 2010] Read outline code's IsCollapsed and ShowIndent from MPP files.
TASKS-29178 - [New for MS Project 2010] Read assignment's field RateScale from MPP files.
TASKS-29181 - [New for MS Project 2010] Read Extended Attribute SecondaryGuid field from MPP files.
TASKS-29179 - [New for MS Project 2010] Read calendar's field IsBaselineCalendar from MPP files.
TASKS-33122 - New MPP Timephased Data format to old XML based Timephased Data conversion.
TASKS-33121 - XML Timephased Data to new MPP Timephased Data conversion.
TASKS-33120 - New API for Timephased Data.
TASKS-27892 - API to create 24 Hours calendar.
TASKS-20522 - Read tasks, resources and assignments baselines Timephased data from MPP (2003/2007/2010) files.

Bugs
TASKS-31112 - [MSP 2003 and 2010] Cannot write and read custom properties.
TASKS-33124 - Incorrect resource assignments’ TimephasedData reading from MS Project MPP file.
TASKS-33129 - [Incorrect TimeSpan Format] Error in loading file.
TASKS-33123 - MSI UI Issues.
summary: Aspose.Slides for .NET is a component to work with Project files
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
